# Sean King (water polo)

| birth_place = Farnborough, Great Britain

Sean King  (born 3 May 1989) is a British water polo player. At the 2012 Summer Olympics, he competed for Great Britain's men's national water polo team in the men's event. He is currently the head of aquatics at Trinity School, Croydon and the water polo coach. He is also a trainer with the Swim England national academy. He has led the school water polo teams to a number of national titles. He is  tall.
